DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct two phase . At first phase , prevalence vitamin D insufficiency primary school-children Tehran determine cold season 2008 . Then , efficacy calcium-vitamin D-fortified milk , -orange juice supplement compare six select primary school .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Calcium-cholecalciferol Foodstuffs Calcium-cholecalciferol Supplement
DOC.detailed_description: At first step , serum 25- ( OH ) D , PTH ( parathyroid hormone ) , osteocalcin , bone alkaline phosphatase , calcium , phosphorous , magnesium evaluate . Anthropometric dietary intake data also collect . In second phase , 6 experimental group : ( 1 ) plain milk ; ( 2 ) calcium-vitamin D-fortified milk ( contain 500 mg Ca 100 IU vitamin D/200 mL package ) ; ( 3 ) plain orange juice ; ( 4 ) fortify orange juice contain equal amount calcium vitamin D fortify milk ; ( 5 ) calcium-vitamin D supplement ( 500 mg calcium 200 IU vitamin D ) ; ( 6 ) placebo . Each group consist 40-60 child ( 9-11 year ) sex . All above-mentioned biochemical , anthropometric dietary intake data collect begin end interventional period .
DOC.criteria: Age : 911 year Being healthy ( apparent clinical disease ) Informed consent sign child 's parent ( ) Subjects receive vitamin D , calcium omega3 supplement Unwillingness continue study Subjects type 1 diabetes , allergy , kidney disorder
